#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

using ll = long long;

const ll mod = 1e9 + 7;

ll mpow(ll b, ll e) {
  if (e == 0) return 1;
  ll r = mpow(b, e / 2);
  r = (r * r) % mod;
  if (e % 2 == 1) r = (r * b) % mod;
  return r;
}

int main() {
  int t;
  cin >> t;
  while (t--) {
    ll c, k;
    cin >> c >> k;
    ll r = 0, p = 1;
    while (2 * p <= c) {
      ++r;
      p *= 2;
    }
    cout << mpow(r, k) << endl;
  }
}
